text: IXL Learning | San Mateo, CA https://ixl.com https://www.ixl.com/company/ https://www.ixl.com/company/jobs Online Math and Language Arts practice for K-12 students - students have answered over 17 billion questions. We are looking for engineers - new grads to senior engineers and project leads, product analysts/designers, tech support, QA, and sales and marketing. IXL is a growing company with about 200 employees.
